verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ry tanora misehoa,
Ambarao ny Tomponao.
Alatsaho ao am-po,
Ny fitiavany anao.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Aza very hevitra
Eo am-pitoerana.
Mitsangàna, mihazavà.
Ianao no andrasana.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hararaoty re izao
Ny fotoana omena anao.
Kely sisa ka vonjeo
'Reo fanahy mitoreo.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Hoy Jesosy raha tety ;
Mandehana mitoria.
Fa Izy hanome hery
Ho anao, ka matokia.
